item.title: Pkpoints into currency
item.dc:creator: @Usagi Usagi
item.description:
@Usagi wrote:

[font=courier]Took me half an hour to come up with something this simple but it works, it does not crash your server and its editable to work with bigger values. I would appreciate it if I get credited somewhere.

if (playerHasItem(6529)) { do { if(playerHasItem(6529, 10000)) { pkpoints = pkpoints + 10000; deleteItem(6529, GetItemSlot(6529), 10000); } else if(playerHasItem(6529, 1000)) { pkpoints = pkpoints + 1000; deleteItem(6529, GetItemSlot(6529), 1000); } else if(playerHasItem(6529, 100)) { pkpoints = pkpoints + 100; deleteItem(6529, GetItemSlot(6529), 100); } else if(playerHasItem(6529, 10)) { pkpoints = pkpoints + 10; deleteItem(6529, GetItemSlot(6529), 10); } else if(playerHasItem(6529, 1)) { pkpoints = pkpoints + 1; deleteItem(6529, GetItemSlot6529), 1); } } while (playerHasItem(6529)); sM("Your pkpoints have been converted back into non-currency form."); sM("You can now exchange pkpoints with npcs but not players."); }

[font=courier]If your having any trouble with it just contact me on msn : Unf4mili4r@hotmail.com[/font]

Read full topic

item.title: Pkpoints into currency
item.dc:creator: @jdog250358 jdog250358@live.com
item.description:
@jdog250358 wrote:

Here’s my code.

if(NPCID == 276){ if(pkpoints > 1) { addItem(6529, pkpoints); pkpoints = 0; sM("You recieve the number of pkpoints you had in a currency form."); sM("Remember, 'currency form' is only for use in trading other players."); } else { if (playerHasItem(6529)) { pkpoints = amountOfItem(6529); deleteItem(6529, 999999999); sM("Your pkpoints have been converted back into non-currency form."); sM("You can now exchange pkpoints with npcs but not players."); } } }

The part of my code not working is this.

if (playerHasItem(6529)) { pkpoints = amountOfItem(6529); deleteItem(6529, 999999999); sM("Your pkpoints have been converted back into non-currency form."); sM("You can now exchange pkpoints with npcs but not players."); }

It doesn’t give me the proper amount of pkpoints, it only gives me 1, please help? And yes I’m using delta.

Read full topic
